website_summaries.verdict: This easy to use and refreshing sheet mask has just the right amount of product to effectively detoxify skin and feel great while doing it.
pros: Given the fact that this sheet mask is made with coconut fibers, it has more of a “gel” feel, allowing it to mold well to face
Mask has pleasant smell and feels luxurious on skin
Vegan-friendly, paraben-free, and not tested on animals
cons: Packaging does not feature in-depth instructions for use

customer_reviews.title: Hydrate to the max!
customer_reviews.text: I've used several masks from the Florapy Beauty line...this one is doesn't disappoint! I tried it for the first time at the end of the day - right before bed. There's not an over powering or distracting jasmine or peppermint scent. Just enough to sense that it's there so you can relax. The cool, gel-like mask (like all of them) stick to your skin, you can feel the coolness right away. Pulls the redness out of the skin. A slight tingle - I'm guessing from the peppermint. I have sensitive skin and didn't have any problems. After the mask - my skin felt VERY moisturized. Even in the morning. I'll be buying these for gifts in addition for myself!
customer_reviews.author: DebraJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect detox face mask
customer_reviews.text: Perfect after a long trip, flight or weekend. It noticeably rebalanced and replenished my skin after wearing makeup for long hours for multiple days in a row (and I think saved me from a breakout). This face mask penetrates deeper than normal face washes or masks. Similar results to getting a facial. Definitely recommend having one of these on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Skin Detox
customer_reviews.text: Ever once in a while, I feel like my skin can look dull - whenever than happens, I like to reach for this mask! The peppermint scent is relaxing and the serum helps revitalize my skin. These sheet masks are 100% which help them stay on your face, making this the perfect pair for a jade roller!
customer_reviews.author: simplykaylav

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer For My Skin!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the Jasmine and Peppermint Florapy sheet mask! These masks have been such a game changer for my skin. As someone who has had acne most of their life, I wish I discovered these sooner. I did not have any cystic acne spots appear this month, which is the first time in years! I also started a new workout routine recently, which I thought would cause a breakout. However, I use the masks after the workouts and so far it has prevented any acne or redness! It smells so good and it has left my skin feeling soft and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Cocker

customer_reviews.title: HANDS DOWN — Best sheet mask I’ve ever used.
customer_reviews.text: I usually never write reviews on products, but this sheet mask actually improved my skin within the 20 minutes it was on, unlike 95% of other competitors. My skin was glowing afterwards & felt extremely moisturized. I especially enjoyed the cooling sensation it gave off — this mask was a 10/10. I ordered 4 others along with this one in a single pack, and might just have to order the bundles for each scent! You need to try Florapy Beauty!!
customer_reviews.author: marie Polidoro

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Florapy mask
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this mask! I am a big fan of the jasmine-peppermint combination in this mask because its soothing, relaxing, and cooling all in one. I recommend using this mask after a hot shower or right before bed because of its calming properties and can really make you feel like you took a quick trip to the spa. I believe that the price of this product is worth it and will 100% be purchasing more!
customer_reviews.author: Kiana

customer_reviews.title: Sinus healer 🙌🏼
customer_reviews.text: This mask has been such a treat today! The peppermint aroma opened up my sinuses and helped clear up my cough. Wasn’t expecting this from a detox face mask but I’ll take the win! The jasmine and peppermint are such a great combo for a relaxing moment after work.
customer_reviews.author: TJ Keith

customer_reviews.title: Fresh finish
customer_reviews.text: This mask leaves your face feeling so fresh and clean. I LOVE peppermint so this was right down my alley. The peppermint gives a cooling feeling and the jasmine scent made me feel really relaxed without spending a ton of money at a spa and in the comfort of my own home. I really enjoyed this mask and firmly believe anyone trying these will love them just as much as I do!
customer_reviews.author: Cobblepot

customer_reviews.title: Detox mask
customer_reviews.text: I used the Jasmine Peppermint Detox mask for the first time tonight. The fragrance of the mask is incredibly calming and a great way to relax. The peppermint tingles your skin slightly, and I love how my skin feels clean and moisturized after using Florapy Beauty masks. My skin feels more refreshed and the experience helps me feel more balanced after a stressful day.
customer_reviews.author: Sammi T.

customer_reviews.title: Cold relief!
customer_reviews.text: I had a bit of a cold this week, so I was hoping that this mask would help relax me, make my skin feel more hydrated, and the peppermint would aid in a little relief from my congestion. It definitely helped! My only wish was that the scent of jasmine and peppermint were more prominent! I love the way the mask made my skin feel though! Very soft afterwards!!
customer_reviews.author: sara glaviano

customer_reviews.title: Works really well!!
customer_reviews.text: This one would probably be my favorite mask because of the smell number one and because of the way it feels on your face. This is really good for if you have a really long day at work or you went to days without washing your face it’s like really good for getting all that extra garbage out of your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: perfect "pick me up"
customer_reviews.text: This is the very first Florapy mask I have ever tried and I fell in love with the brand. The ingredients are the bomb, I love that they use coconut oil instead of paper! These always make me feel like I'm at a five star spa. I want a skincare fridge FULLLL of them. These are 100% worth the $, TRUST!
customer_reviews.author: dave yezback

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing and Refreshing
customer_reviews.text: Refreshing mint scent makes for a great wake up routine, it's invigorating. The coconut sheets make for easy placement and they hold really well without slipping. I've been using them for about two weeks now and I've noticed a difference in some of my trouble/dry patches.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Kress

customer_reviews.title: Hydrating with no slimy face feel!
customer_reviews.text: Hydration is right. My skin felt super soft after using this. The perfect balance of peppermint to give a cooling sensation without the burn. I felt so refreshed after my 20 min treatment and the best part is I didn’t feel like desire to wash my face after!
customer_reviews.author: kleanthi Gregor

customer_reviews.title: Very refreshing
customer_reviews.text: This mask is so refreshing! I like to store a few in the fridge for an extra cooling effect. Leaves my face hydrated and moisturized
customer_reviews.author: moments71

customer_reviews.title: Feeling fresh!
customer_reviews.text: I had a painful blemish under the surface of my skin for days, and decided to seek help with this mask. It brought the blemish to the surface, and quickly resolved the issue (no multiple days of coverup needed!) as well as shrunk my pores and gave me a radiant glow. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: beewels

customer_reviews.title: Absolute favorite!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask so much, the smell is amazing and it gets rid of fine lines. I like using this to get the circulation in my face going. And its jam packed with the best ingredients for your skin. Morning skincare routine approved!
customer_reviews.author: JoAnna McMurray

customer_reviews.title: A Must!
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with this mask the second I put it on. It has an amazing cooling affect and tingles my face. I have sensitive skin and it did not irritate it. The coconut jelly is amazing. It left my skin feeling renewed.
customer_reviews.author: Currin Adams

customer_reviews.title: So Fresh and Clean!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect detox mask for every day use! The minty fresh scent is so clean and refreshing - I looked forward to putting this mask on. The jasmine peppermint is a perfect combo that penetrates deep into the skin. Its like having the luxury of a facial in the palm of your hand.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: Great detox mask!
customer_reviews.text: I use peppermint aromatherapy regularly to help relax and de-stress, so the fact that this infused with peppermint makes it my new favorite mask. I used it after a long day and immediately felt the tingly yet calming effects. My skin felt so soft and renewed afterward, I will definitely be purchasing again!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Smith

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time using this mask and I LOVED it. The gel mask is amazing and formed to my skin really well and the quality is great. I love how the peppermint smells and makes my skin feel refreshed. I will definitely purchase again! (:
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Best mask!
customer_reviews.text: I love how florapy masks feel very authentic. The fact that they're vegan as well as cruelty free means a lot. This doesn't compromise how great the masks are either! I loved how easy they were to use and the great smell. I will definitely be buying more florapy masks!
customer_reviews.author: katherinesandra

customer_reviews.title: ❤️
customer_reviews.text: As usual well soaked in product and after use we really see a difference I recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Aninaht

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing and Hydrating !
customer_reviews.text: I loved this mask ! left my face feeling so moisturized and refreshed ! I also used this before going to bed and it had me so relaxed! the smell is so nice ! this mask does not disappoint!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Candice C.

customer_reviews.title: Skin felt refreshed!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! My skin felt so refreshed after the mask definitely would recommend to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: BCNoriega

customer_reviews.title: Great mask!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mask! The mint fragrance was nice and subtle and gave my skin a little minty tingle when using. I have dry, sensitive skin and I felt that it helped hydrate too! Definitely would do again!
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: My skin felt so rejuvenated afterwards!
customer_reviews.text: The peppermint scent of this face mask was calming on my face, yet left my skin feeling fresh and rejuvenated long afterwards! Such a yummy smell and fresh feeling!
customer_reviews.author: Alaina Hammer

customer_reviews.title: Great cooling effect
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this mask, it felt so good on my skin
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Bihan-Poudec

customer_reviews.title: Felt no difference after use
customer_reviews.text: I didn't notice any difference in my skin after using this mask.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Leaves your face feeling smooth
customer_reviews.text: I liked how cooling this mask felt when on, and it woke me up. Like the scent!
customer_reviews.author: Danya D

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This mask is amazing! I truly felt relaxed after using this mask. It has a calming sensation and left my skin feeling refreshed.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan McKim

customer_reviews.title: Favorite
customer_reviews.text: Promoted skin to release some existing blemishes in a healthy way and not irritating.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Loved this mask!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a fan of anything cooling and minty. This was perfectly refreshing without being too much. Enjoyed it while wearing it and my ski felt so good even the next morning!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Hart

customer_reviews.title: These are the best
customer_reviews.text: Love the material these masks are made out of.. so easy to put on and smells so good
customer_reviews.author: Alex Madge

customer_reviews.title: Pore Clearing Sheet Mask
customer_reviews.text: I am a sucker for minty face masks/treatments because of my acne prone skin. I was going through a breakout when I used this mask and I felt as though it really helped clear my pores unblemish my skin. The mint smell was an added bonus! The mask itself was great quality and felt so natural on my face, unlike many other sheet masks I have tried. This is yet another great mask from Florapy!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Colton

customer_reviews.title: Great smell
customer_reviews.text: Awesome refreshing peppermint smell, and soothing, cooling sensation while it's on, but doesn't really have a long term effect on skin compared to other sheet masks I've tried
customer_reviews.author: Katie H

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really high quality mask, for sure worth the money and will get again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for aromotherapy, don't know if it is effective on skin
customer_reviews.text: First thing to know about Florapy Beauty Detox Sheet Aromatherapy Mask is that is smells amazing (I had peppermint) and is easy to apply. The mask is giant so should fit any face type. I left my mask on for 15-20 minutes and then rubbed the remaining serum onto my skin per the instructions. I have super sensitive skin so fortunately this mask didn't cause any negative reactions. Overall, while I loved this mask (the smell and state of mind) I'm not sure it actually worked to detoxify anything. I would use it again based on how it made me feel (calming state of relaxation) but I don't know that it would detoxify my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: A breath of fresh air
customer_reviews.text: With the popularity of essential oils, it’s easy these days to smell the benefits of aromatherapy, and in this case feel the effects. Facial masks have also improved from our grandparents’ use of eggs and mayonnaise and other home items to improve one’s complexion. This florapy detox mask uses jasmine and peppermint. It is very simple to use straight from the pack. The mask itself is made from 100% coconut, and it’s a truly refreshing treat for anyone needing a spa moment. It’s a breath of fresh air, that is, jasmine-peppermint air.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This Aromatherapy mask from Florapy Beauty has a wonderful peppermint fragrance when you open the pouch. Once I put it on, I found that you definitely have to be sitting or lying down while its on or it will slide off. I agree with the other reviewers, in that I'm not sure it did anything to detox or reduce wrinkles, but it was relaxing! The price seems high to me for one mask.
customer_reviews.author: D. Couse

customer_reviews.title: Smells great but no visible change to skin.
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and leaves you feeling pampered, especially when this is paired with something like a long soak in the tub. But I don't think it did anything really for my skin. It's possible there might have more visible results with several applications. However my order was for just one mask. Great for pampering, but don't expect any major changes to your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Where the Sidewalk Ends

customer_reviews.title: First Timer
customer_reviews.text: This was my first mask. My wife uses them all the time and I thought I should give it a shot. I was very pleased with the experience. It's super easy to put on and it definitely had noticeable results. I am excited to try more. This one in particular smelled so good. It says to leave on for 20 minutes but I left it on longer because I enjoyed it that much.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor J. Flannigan

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing, but no effect of extraction
customer_reviews.text: My skin is both very oily and ageing. This masque has a fresh scent, and seems to soften the skin, but it has no effect on removing any trapped oil. It is nice for soothing the face, but is unlikely to be a product I'll use again, because it neither exfoliates nor reduces the oily buildup.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth G Melillo

customer_reviews.title: Love the Peppermint feel and Smell
customer_reviews.text: This brand of face mask is top notch,the smell is a strong but nice mint. They go on easy and rinse off well. Leaves your face feeling smooth and fresh.
customer_reviews.author: TomSTPete

customer_reviews.title: So refreshing!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Jasmine-Peppermint scent! After using the mask my skin was so smooth and I felt refreshed. I can't wait to try the other scents. I would definitely recommend this product to a friend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try!
customer_reviews.text: I recieved this product from a monthly beauty subscription. I love it! I have very fair sensitive skin. Most of the time peppermint burns my skin and makes my eyes cry. Not this!! It's sutle and not over powering. Also, not having to wash your face once the mask is over, means less irritation. I encourage you to give it a try. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: mollie ayers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite of all the florapy masks.....feels so great on my skin
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good scent
customer_reviews.text: You open the package and there is already pre made areas for your eyes, nose, and mouth. Very easy to apply to your face. There is a lot of liquid in this mask so be aware when you open the package. Now slide it on your face and you can take your time smoothing it around your eyes, forehead, cheekbones. It stays really well in place which surprised me. This has a light jasmine, peppermint scent and you almost forget you have it on. Over all it felt great and relaxing. I left it on for twenty minutes and rubbed the excess cream into my skin. I thought it was nice.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Jo

customer_reviews.title: Invigorating
customer_reviews.text: I found the peppermint fragrance of this face mask to be invigorating. The jasmine was a nice scent too, but it was the peppermint that really stimulated my skin. The mask is a very big sheet and it completely covered my face. It felt soothing too while I had it on. It comes off easily, but I'm not sure it took off much of the build up or dirt on my skin. It did feel moisturized and refreshed though. I think I'll stick with my usual cleaners to clean my pores and it would be good to follow with this mask.
customer_reviews.author: W. Simpsen

customer_reviews.title: Cooling and refreshing
customer_reviews.text: I love that this mask is cool and smells great. It is sandwiched between two layers of film that you peel off to reveal a thin lotioned membrane like material. It felt good on my skin, and was a refreshing to keep on my face for twenty minutes. After taking it off, I massaged the lotion from the mask into my skin. My skin was glowing the rest of the evening. Definitely a nice treat after a long day.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: It was Ok, but we probably will not be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.text: It was a little confusing how to free the mask from the packaging. It is possible to get confused about which part is the mask and which is packaging. It is a little weird having to keep it on for 20 minutes, it has a strong smell that is a little uncomfortable to breathe in for 20 minutes. The smell is not bad, but it isn't a relaxing spa experience, it is more an ongoing attempt to keep a cold slimy thing on your face. It was not horrible, but we probably won't be purchasing it in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Newman

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing well designed mask. Scent is Peppermint, period.
customer_reviews.text: I love this line of masks do was eager to try this. The mechanics are so well thought out, this is a mask that is easy to put on and stays put, no sliding or dripping. My only disappointment is that the jasmine peppermint is ...not. The peppermint is very strong and overwhelms whatever jasmine scent might have existed. I thought that was an odd combination anyway since peppermint is generally so dominant. Other than that, great hydrating mask.
customer_reviews.author: Quickbeam

customer_reviews.title: Great brand for facial masks
customer_reviews.text: These masks are great - nice brand, made in Korea, they smell great and there's plenty of serum for the mask and for an extra application later. This one makes your skin feel great - really felt like having a facial, with a slight tingle from the peppermint. And I like that these masks are all-natural - made of coconut fibers.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle

customer_reviews.title: Indifferent
customer_reviews.text: I'm kind of indifferent to this Florapy Beauty Detox Mask. I've not used this type of mask before (my favorite is a clay one that I paint onto my face) and I found this kind of sloppy and drippy. It smelled wonderful, but I didn't notice any difference in my skin after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Hunting Creek

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit well
customer_reviews.text: Slimy and uncomfortable. Does do much for my skin. Can't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne R. Arnholt

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Leaves skin looking and feeling nice and has a nice scent.
customer_reviews.author: Oceania

customer_reviews.title: Love that it's vegan friendly
customer_reviews.text: Pros-loved how refreshing it felt on my face and the formula it left when removed allowed me to massage my face. Love that it's vegan friendly, no animal testing and paraben free. Cons-Needs more details, like how often to use and if it matters which side goes on face. This is the reason for my 4 rating on this mask. Once corrected definitely a 5 star!
customer_reviews.author: Delia

product_meta.title: Florapy Beauty Detox Sheet Aromatherapy Mask, Jasmine Peppermint, 5 Count
product_meta.description: Color:Jasmine Peppermint| Size:5 Count100% Coconut Aromatherapy Sheet Mask. Detoxify and cleanse with the renewing and refreshing energy of Jasmine and Peppermint. Peppermint aromatherapy empowers healing, balancing and mental clarity. The jasmine flower helps stimulate the skin, promotes elasticity and reduces the appearance of fine lines. Cooling peppermint refreshes dull, tired skin and helps promote circulation for clean, supple and youthful feeling skin. Enhanced with Recovery Essence 8 - a proprietary blend of vervain flower, grapeseed oil, olive oil, clary sage oil, carrot oil, almond oil, rosehip and vitamin E. Recommended use 1-3x per week.
feature_bullets: Detoxify and cleanse with the renewing and refreshing energy of Jasmine and Peppermint
Peppermint aromatherapy empowers healing, balancing and mental clarity

Jasmine flower helps stimulate the skin, promotes elasticity and reduces the appearance of fine lines. Peppermint oil refreshes dull skin and helps promote circulation for clean, youthful feeling skin
Florapy is a natural sheet mask made of 100% coconut fibers, it adheres gently to the contours of the skin and imparts an instant cooling sensation
Flowers + Aromatherapy = Florapy Designed in Los Angeles, Made in Korea

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
